name: open-in-atom
description: Open the current file in the Atom editor

openInAtom.basePath.description: The absolute path on the machine to the folder that is expected to contain all repositories.

scripts.serve: yarn run symlink-package && parcel serve --no-hmr --out-file dist/open-in-atom.js src/open-in-atom.ts
scripts.sourcegraph:prepublish: yarn run typecheck && yarn run build
